title: (x) "Take Your Girlie to the Movies" hand-drawn serif face - hand drawn {Stephen}
content:
It only took minutes last time to id the font I posted, Thanks and my Admiration

Now looking for the title font for Take Your Girlie to the Movies (it’s on each side of the page for the link below)

[http://www.goldensilents.com/girliemovies/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225820/http:/www.goldensilents.com/girliemovies/ "http://www.goldensilents.com/girliemovies/")

Thanks again In Advance

dRb

author: DrBeaver

comments.content: Hand drawn. For fonts of a similar style, see [this list](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225820/http:/typographica.org/000737.php).
